Description of the columns for OBIC

2019-12-04

Source: vignettes/description-of-the-columns.Rmd
description-of-the-columns.Rmd
library(OBIC)

The main function of the package obic() requires as input a data.table with specific columns. These columns are specified in OBIC::column_description.obic and can also be seen in the table below

desc <- OBIC::column_description.obic
knitr::kable(desc)
column type description_nl description_en unit method
A_CLAY_MI measurement Kleigehalte Clay content % NA
A_SAND_MI measurement Zandgehalte Sand content % NA
A_SILT_MI measurement Siltgehalte Silt content % NA
A_KALK_MI measurement Koolzure kalk Carbonated lime % NA
A_OS_GV measurement Organische stof Organic matter % NA
A_C_FR measurement C-fractie Organische stof C fraction organic matter - NA
A_CN_RAT measurement CN ratio CN ratio NA NA
A_PH_CC measurement zuurgraad (pH) acidity (pH) - NA
A_CEC_CO measurement kationomwisselcapaciteit Cation exchange capacity mmol+/kg NA
A_K_CEC measurement K-bezetting CEC K occupancy CEC % NA
A_K_CC measurement K-CaCl2 K-CaCl2 mg K /kg CaCl2 extraction
A_CA_CEC measurement Ca-bezetting CEC Ca occupancy CEC % NA
A_MG_CEC measurement Mg-bezetting CEC Mg occupancy CEC % NA
A_MN_CC measurement Mn-plantbeschikbaar Mn plant available ug Mn/ kg CaCl2 extraction
A_CU_CC measurement Cu-plantbeschikbaar Cu plant available ug Cu/ kg CaCl2 extraction
A_ZN_CC measurement Zn-plantbeschikbaar Zn plant available ug Zn/ kg CaCl2 extraction
A_N_TOT measurement N-totaal bodemvoorraad N soil reserves mg N/ kg NA
A_P_PAL measurement P-bodemvoorraad P soil reserves mg P2O5/100 g NA
A_P_PAE measurement P-plantbeschikbaar P plant available mg P/kg CaCl2 extraction
A_P_WA measurement P-water P water NA NA
A_MG_CC measurement Mg-plantbeschikbaar Mg plant available mg Mg/kg NA
A_S_TOT measurement S-totaal bodemvoorraad S soil reserves mg S/kg NA
A_N_PMN measurement Microbiele activiteit Microbial activity mg N/ kg NA
A_MB_PFLA measurement Microbiele Biomassa Microbial biomass ? NA
A_SB_FR measurement Ratio schimmels en bacterien Ratio of fungi and bacteria - NA
A_B_BC measurement Beworteling Rooting score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_VO_BC measurement Verdichting ondergrond Compaction score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_RW_BC measurement Regenwormen Earthworms score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_BS_BC measurement Bodemstructuur Soil structure score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_GV_BC measurement Aantal gekleurde vlekken Number of coloured spots score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_PV_BC measurement Plasvorming Ponding score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_AS_BC measurement Scheuren Cracks score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_SV_BC measurement Spoorvorming/ vertrapping Trace formation / trampling score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_RD_BC measurement Worteldiepte Root depth score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_SS_BC measurement Bodemstructuur Soil structure score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
A_CO_BC measurement Gewasdichtheid Crop density score 1-10 BodemConditieScore
B_GT measurement Grondwatertrap Groundwater level - NA
B_BT_BK measurement Bodemtype Bodemtype - bodemkaart 1:50000
B_BT_AK measurement Bodemtype Agronomische Classificering Bodemtype Agronomische Classificering - NA
B_LU_BRP measurement Gewascode Crop cod - BRP
B_LU measurement Bouwland of Grasland Arable land or Grassland - NA
B_LG_CBS measurement Landbouweconomisch kerngebied 2016 Key agricultural area 2016 - CBS
B_NR_RIVM measurement NitraatUitspoelingsRisico Nitrate leaching risk - RIVM
B_RWT_DANK measurement Regenwormen in Nederland (taxa) Earthworms in the Netherlands (taxa) - DANK
B_RWA_DANK measurement Regenwormen in Nederland (abundantie) Regenwormen in Nederland (abundantie) - DANK
B_OV_WENR measurement Risico op ondergrondverdichting Risk of soil compaction - WENR
B_HELP_WENR measurement Grondsoortcode HELP-tabel Ground type code HELP table - WENR
M_M1 measurement Is perceel in afgelopen 3 jaar bekalkt Has field been limed in the past 3 years ja/nee NA
M_M2 measurement Frequentie graslandvernieuwing Frequency of grassland renewal per x jaar NA
M_M3 measurement Frequentie compostgebruik Frequency of compost use per x jaar NA
M_M4 measurement Ploegen Plowing ja/nee NA
M_M5 measurement Weidevogelbeheer via ANLB Meadow bird management via ANLB ja/nee NA
M_M6 measurement Gebruik groenbemesters Usage green manure ja/nee NA
M_M7 measurement Gebruik van vaste rijpaden Use of fixed lanes ja/nee NA
M_M8 measurement Gebruik van luchtdrukbanden/ lichtere machines Use of pneumatic tyres/lighter machines ja/nee NA
M_M9 measurement Bemestingsverleden met organische mest Fertilization history with organic manure 3 keuzes NA
M_M10 measurement Is het perceel 80% van het jaar groen Is the field green 80% of the year ja/nee NA
M_M11 measurement wordt berijding in het najaar vermeden (vroege rassen) avoidance of autumnal spraying (early varieties) ja/nee NA
M_M12 measurement wordt drijfmest toegediend via sleepslangbemesting slurry is applied via hose fertilisation ja/nee NA
M_M13 measurement is er onderwaterdrainage aangelegd (veen) underwater drainage has been constructed (peat) ja/nee NA
M_M14 measurement worden sloten op diepte gehouden en het bagger benut ditches are kept at depth and the dredging is used. ja/nee NA
M_M15 measurement is er grasonderzaai in mais toegepast grass underseeding has been used in maize ja/nee NA
D_SE derivative Versplemping The risk of soil sealing - NA
D_CR derivative Verkruimelbaarheid The crumbleability of the soil - NA
D_BDS derivative Dichtheid The bulk density of the soil kg / m3 NA
D_NLV derivative Stikstoflevering The nitrogen supply capacity kg N / ha NA
D_RD derivative Bemonsteringsdiepte The agronomic used sampling depth for soil analysis m NA
D_OC derivative Koolstofvoorraad The amount of organic carbon kg C /ha NA
D_OS_BAL derivative EOS-balans net Effective Organic Matter balance kg EOS / ha NA
D_GA derivative Leeftijd grasland The average age of the grass yr NA
D_MAN derivative - Management evaluation - NA
D_CP_STARCH derivative - The fraction of starch in crop rotation - NA
D_CP_POTATO derivative - The fraction of potato in crop rotation - NA
D_CP_SUGARBEET derivative - The fraction of sugarbeet in crop rotation - NA
D_CP_GRASS derivative - The fraction of grass in crop rotation - NA
D_CP_MAIS derivative - The fraction of mais in crop rotation - NA
D_CP_OTHER derivative - The fraction of other in crop rotaton - NA
D_PH_DELTA derivative De advies-pH The difference with the optimum pH - NA
D_P_U derivative Verstuivingsrisico Wind erodibility - NA
D_SLV derivative Zwavellevering Sulphur NA NA
D_MG derivative Magnesiumbuffering Magnesium NA NA
D_CU derivative Koperbeschikbaarheid Copper NA NA
D_ZN derivative Zinkbeschikbaarheid Zinc NA NA
D_PMN derivative Activiteit bodemleven Soil life activity NA NA
D_C_CEC derivative Kationbuffering CEC NA NA
D_P_CEC derivative Aggregaatstabiliteit Aggregate stability NA NA
D_BCS derivative BodemConditieScore Visual Soil Condition Score NA NA
D_P_WRI derivative Plant beschikbaar water Water retention NA NA
D_WSI derivative Waterstress moisture supply NA NA
D_NGW derivative N vasthoudend vermogen voor grondwater Nitrogen retention for ground water NA NA
D_NSW derivative N vasthoudend vermogen voor oppervlaktewater Nitrogen retention for surface water NA NA
I_C_N indicator Stikstoflevering Nitrogen NA NA
I_C_P indicator Fosfaatbuffering Phosphorus NA NA

I_C_ZN indicator Zinkbeschikbaarheid Zinc NA NA

I_P_MS indicator Waterstress Moisture supply NA NA
I_P_BC indicator Draagkracht Bearing capacity NA NA
I_P_DU indicator Verstuifingsrisico Dustiness NA NA
I_P_CO indicator Ondergrondverdichting Compaction NA NA
I_P_WRI indicator Plant beschikbaar water Water retention NA NA
I_P_CEC indicator Aggregaatstabiliteit Aggregate stability NA NA
I_B_DI indicator Ziektewerendheid Disease / pest resistance NA NA
I_B_SF indicator Activiteit bodemleven Soil life activity NA NA
I_B_SB indicator Bodembiodiversiteit Soil biodiversity NA NA
I_E_NGW indicator N vasthoudend vermogen voor grondwater Nitrogen retention for ground water NA NA
I_E_NSW indicator N vasthoudend vermogen voor oppervlaktewater Nitrogen retention for surface water NA NA
I_M indicator Label Duurzaam Bodembeheer Soil management evaluation NA NA

S_C score bodemchemie Chemical score NA NA
S_P score bodemstructuur Physical score NA NA
S_B score bodembiologie Biological score NA NA
S_M score management Managment score NA NA
S_T score totale OBI-score Total score NA NA
RM_C_1 recommendation Advies 1 First chemical recommended measure ID NA NA
RM_C_2 recommendation Advies 2 Second chemical recommended measure ID NA NA
RM_C_3 recommendation Advies 3 Third chemical recommended measure ID NA NA
RM_P_1 recommendation Advies 1 First physical recommended measure ID NA NA
